item.title: Android Automation with IFTTT
item.description: A while back I covered some automation using Zapier and IFTTT. Recently IFTTT (If This Then That) has added Android specific channels to it’s recipe creation page. This opens the door for tons of automated tasks on your Android device. [...]

item.title: The 2014 Flagship Killer
item.description: Last night OnePlus unvieled their new flagship device the OnePlus One. It’s been told it’s going to be the Nexus 5 killer, besting it in specs, price, and security. Get hyped [...]

item.title: Windows 8.1 - Update 1
item.description: The new Windows 8.1 Update has been out for a few days now bringing a ton of new features. I've gotta say, Microsoft is really starting to listen to it's users. [...]
